channel.title: Can I make you laugh? – The University of Abject Submission
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: The Beatings Will Continue
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description: The silent auction was cancelled. :( But I kind of promised you guys. So here it is! And thank you, TES Fest, for Making Me Do It. Sort of. :p

item.title: Video Special: Is It Safe for Work?
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description: I’ve had enough psychoanalysis for the moment. For a change, shall we watch my favourite maybe-not-quite-safe-for-work videos? First, the legendary Gypsy Rose Lee. A comedienne first, an ecdysiast second. And then there’s Sadie the bellydancer too. How do you make bellydancing demure and understated? I don’t know! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YamDoDK71Ds I know these hula dancers are not … Continue reading Video Special: Is It Safe for Work? →

item.title: I’m Just Weird
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description: I haven’t worn a bikini since age 4. Legs? What legs? I like my sleeves, too. Oh, and I don’t drink. Alcohol, coffee OR soft drinks. Ick. Obviously, I’m secretly Mormon, I just haven’t told me yet. Though I hear Mormons are allowed to wear more makeup than this. And dance. EYES I can’t look … Continue reading I’m Just Weird →

item.title: I Wish I’d Said That
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description: I usually update every 5 days. But my chronic aches have been bad. I’m officially out of pre-written posts. Will I manage another one by 1 August? Wish me luck! The French have a word for it: l’esprit d’escalier. Literally, staircase wit. The perfect retort that only occurs to you after it’s too late. But … Continue reading I Wish I’d Said That →

item.title: Embarrassed. Gorgeous. Naked.
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description: My mother sent me this not-quite-vanilla video. As the host apparently said, this is one act where you hope they’ll make a mistake! It seems these two adorable lads are French-Canadian acrobatic clowns who call themselves Les Beaux Frères, a pun on “handsome brothers” and “brothers-in-law”. I don’t know how long this video will stay … Continue reading Embarrassed. Gorgeous. Naked. →

item.title: When You Need a (Kinky) Laugh
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description: We all need a bit of cheering up after that last post. But as a non-practical-joker, I was handicapped in celebrating April Fools’ Day. Instead, may I belatedly offer you some variegated entertainment in the form of images, words and music? First, here is my spanking new Pinterest board, BDSM Humour: Follow Yingtai’s board BDSM Humour on Pinterest. … Continue reading When You Need a (Kinky) Laugh →

item.title: Coming Out: The Sequel
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description: My friends and I were not brought up to discuss sex, and so kink does not come up in conversation. But this has changed a little since I wrote my coming-out letter, because I have now come out to five more friends and one more brother (which is enough for now). As I expected, everyone was supportive. But … Continue reading Coming Out: The Sequel →
